Posts.Content: Hello I hope it's ok to post another question. I found the support after posting last week fantastic so thank you ladies! Feel much more positive and am turning the energy I was using to worry to now fight this head on!  I am having lymph node clearance on Thursday and just wondered what pain relief people found helpful so I can get prepared. Also how long before it is usual to be able to drive etc? I know everyone is different but I'm not sure what to expect. I was so shocked when I was at the clinic I forgot to ask the usual questions!  Any help much appreciated.  Sarah
Posts.Title: Axiallary clearance

Posts.Content: Hello Thank you so much for your reply. That is a good idea about getting some neuropathic painkillers, I think I may get them in just in case as my op is Thursday afternoon so of course it will be hard to get something over the weekend should I need it.  Thanks again.  Sarah
Posts.Title: Axiallary clearance

Posts.Content: Hi Julia Thank you for that advise. I am worried about not doing too much too soon as I am not very good at resting but I have bought lots of gentle things to keep me busy.  Fingers crossed it all heals quickly! Sarah x
